storyInfo: Nuova Volsinii is currently free of mafiosi, but the famiglie have not given up on infiltrating the city. They're trying to use 'companies' to make inroads into the Truckers' Union. Eirene learns that her friend was the one who, while smuggling for the Venezia family, accidentally injured Leontuzzo.

attributes.content: <p=2>November 6th, 1100    1:35 P.M.</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: I've sent Pedro and the others away, so no one will be coming to the camp for now.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Eirene, you were with Judge Lavinia last night. Do you know how badly Leontuzzo is injured? Is he...?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: They were able to rescue him from the crash site last night, but his condition is not good.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: The trucker slumps into the chair like a deflated balloon, covering his face with his dirty gloves.
He's still so young, and such a good man... Please, don't let anything happen to him—ah, I really...!
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: What happened, actually?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Was it an accident?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: I, I don't know. I was just driving along, and all of a sudden, my steering wheel wouldn't turn right.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: I didn't have time to react and crashed the truck. By the time I came to, it was all over...
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: But... even if you panicked at the moment, you shouldn't have left a critically injured person by the roadside and driven away!
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Do you realize that if first responders had arrived just a few minutes later, Leontuzzo would have...
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: I know you're not like that.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Sorry, Eirene. I really wanted to help him. I know I should have helped him. I'm not a bad guy.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: But, but I had to drive off.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Sommer, talk to me!
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: What was in that truck?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Eirene's voice starts to tremble. The driver, slumped in his chair, looks pale.
I'm sorry, Eirene...
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Sommer, who were you driving that truck for?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Venezia Trucking... Famiglia Venezia.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: The silence hangs in the air for what seems like forever. Then, Eirene finally speaks.
Is this because of Guri?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Don't try to justify it, Eirene. I know I made a huge mistake.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Why? Why go to them rather than seek help from the Truckers' Union?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: You're the most senior trucker in the union. You know how unique our situation is in Nuova Volsinii—both City Hall and the famiglie are watching us like hawks.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Eirene, we all know how expensive Oripathy medication is.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Besides, once I bring Guri to Nuova Volsinii, between settling her in and getting her into a good school... who knows how much all of that will cost?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: I'm here too, aren't I? I can help. You're the one who saved me back in Sicilia. Guri is my sister too.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Eirene, the union can't help me fix this.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: So you're gonna do it by yourself...?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Goods shipped in from other cities or shipments between local merchants, every item we touch must be registered in advance.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: In the past six months, I've personally reviewed every single schedule, and we've passed all routine inspections. How could you alone have managed to—could it be that...?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: I'm not doing this alone, Eirene.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: So none of you know where Sommer went?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Is it possible he already ran back to Sicilia under cover of darkness? I mean, he did hit the Acting Mayor's car, you know!
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: The police are going to throw everything they have at this case. Will we be exposed? Smuggling contraband is a red line for City Hall, especially since we were doing it to help you...
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: No, no. This has nothing to do with Venezia Trucking.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: What? You mean, you're gonna tie up all the 'loose ends'?
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: 'Tie up loose ends'? Spoken like a true wise guy. Haha.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: But no, I'm not. Relax. Do you see me carrying any weapons? Just keep your mouth shut, and everything will be fine. Capisce?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: But what if the cops start breathing down our necks?
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: We've been hiding this stuff from Eirene and getting sweated by City Hall all this time. If something really does happen, you can't just wash your hands of all this!
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: (Shrugs)
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: If you really wanna pick nits here, we are even less to blame.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Venezia Trucking has never violated the 'New Urban Management Act', nor has it ever tried to infiltrate the Truckers' Union or interfere with Nuova Volsinii's logistics system.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: Sommer wants to bring his daughter here to treat her for Oripathy, right?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: He already found a good hospital, but he can't afford to pay for the treatment. Instead, he's using union trucks as private hospital vehicles to help the Logistics Department transport goods.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Venezia Trucking is at the bottom of the list, when it comes to that Hospital's financial backers. We have no connection to Sommer, apart from being in the same city.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: No. That's not true.
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: And you, you're just a drunk who can't even sit up straight in the driver's seat half the time. You had to secretly hire someone to drive for you just to keep your job.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: We signed a service agreement, I'll have you know! I'm just a driver-for-hire trying to make some extra cash.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: I was sick! They had to put me on painkillers!
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: You got some kind of leverage over every single truck driver you approach.
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: Nuova Volsinii values the rule of law. We can go to court and present the evidence piece by piece. Then we'll see whose hands are clean.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: You—you people are even scarier without weapons!
attributes.name: Truck Driver

attributes.content: Really? I'm glad you say that, because I used to think I looked like a dork quoting laws like that.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Alright. Calm down everyone.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Enough threats. Let's just fix this. You guys go find our 'tires', and we'll handle the rest.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: ...How long has it been?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: They found me six months ago. I reckon that they'd already dealt with a few dozen other drivers before then.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: What choice did we have? Running even one shipment for them pays more than we earn in a month.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Besides, if we don't cooperate, they have plenty of ways to push us right out of this city.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: After Signora Sicilia took power, she implemented all these reforms, in all of Siracusa's cities. The cunning guys adapted to the new rules far faster than we did...
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Are you speaking for yourself, or for others?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Eirene, I beg you, help us!
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: I promise you! Once Carnevale is over, we'll never smuggle anything for those goons ever again!
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: You can turn me in, but please, you have to help the others. They really had no choice but to—
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: ....The list of names.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Don't try and fool me. If you guys were doing this stuff, you had to have made a list of names. Give it to me.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: ...At least tell me how many of you there are. Then I'll try and see what I can do.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Sommer puts down the lighter he has been clutching and begins searching through his pockets.
Sommer, why do you still have that lighter? I thought you quit smoking.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: It was a gift from you. I'm used to carrying it around.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Actually, I found it lying around near the supermarket. There's no way I could afford to buy such an expensive lighter.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Do you remember? After Guri's mother passed away, you took over that supermarket, managing the business while raising your child. Then one day, you found me, homeless, at your doorstep.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: You always say you just took in a delivery driver and cashier who didn't ask for a salary, but I know you actually gave me a place to stay—a home.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Later, Famiglia Tocco set their sights on us. They were just a small family, but even after we stocked their products, they wouldn't let up. They threatened us, demanding we remove their competitors' items from the shelves.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: We told them we'd consider their request, but then that same night, a huge fire broke out in the supermarket, which is how Guri contracted Oripathy.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: That's all in the past. Why are you bringing it up now?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: I found it. Here you are.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Carmelo, Gianni, Ruggiero. What a surprise.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: ...Sorry.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Don't say any more, Sommer. Go to the storehouse. There is a wooden crate behind that truck that's being repaired. Bring it to me.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: But that's...everything you own, isn't it?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Alright... alright.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Sommer, what you don't know is, I found that lighter right next to the scene of the supermarket fire.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: We came to Nuova Volsinii because we had nothing.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Everyone makes mistakes at some point...
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: But I can't let you destroy all of this.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Judge Lavinia.
attributes.name: Private Physician

attributes.content: I'm here to see Leon.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I need to ask you all a favor—do not disclose Leon's condition to outsiders. This info is strictly need-to-know.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Sure. I understand.
attributes.name: Private Physician

attributes.content: It seems I'm in the right place.
Who are you looking for? This is a special ward. You can't just barge in here!
attributes.name: Private Physician

attributes.content: No, it's ok. Let her come in.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Well then, I'll get going. Please find me if you need anything.
attributes.name: Private Physician

attributes.content: ...Texas.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Long time no see.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Long time no see.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I just grabbed some millefoglie and macaroni downstairs. Have a bite if you're hungry—I'll keep an eye on Leontuzzo for now.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I received your invitation.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: We never heard back from you. We assumed you weren't planning to return to Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I was busy.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Croissant is busy pushing Bison into organizing some new international project, Sora is only halfway through her tour of Siracusa, and Exusiai—who knows where she's run off to this time?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I've been managing Penguin Logistics myself this whole time, with far fewer staff and no fewer orders.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Besides, these crowded celebrations really don't excite me. I prefer just stopping by when I'm on a delivery, assuming it's on the way.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Then what brings you here today?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: What can I do? I have a boss who loves a good crowd. One night, he happened to spot that invitation and had me pack my bags on the spot.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: He's very interested in the 'themed party' you're hosting. He cleared his calendar, shut down 'The Ends of the Earth' for two weeks, and dragged me here all the way from Lungmen.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Relax, Lavinia. You seem so tense.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Leon, he...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I've been briefed on it.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: It wasn't an accident?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: The police are still investigating. I just got back from the scene... I don't think it was an accident.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Persons of interest?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The usual suspects?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Uhuh.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: On the night of the Carnevale parade, Leon was supposed to officially announce his appointment as mayor of Nuova Volsinii at the front of the procession.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: It's not a strange decision, per se, but he did seem a bit too eager.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Even if he abandoned his family, he is still Bernardo Bellone's son. One year is not enough for people to forget the turmoil Bernardo once stirred in Volsinii.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Staying behind the scenes makes it easier for him to keep the government functioning. This is the safest approach. It's much better than him changing clothes, putting down his defensive staff, and stepping back into the spotlight.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Nuova Volsinii has only been around for a year and he's barely managing to hold onto his position as Acting Mayor, even with Signora Sicilia's backing.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I told him all of this already.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: ...Right.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Lavinia, your comms device has been flashing for a while now.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Did they find new evidence?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: No, it's a message from the court. We have a case...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: That's kind of tricky?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Uhuh.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Honestly, I understand why Leon was in such a hurry.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: This year, the changes in Nuova Volsinii can be seen with the naked eye. Many things that once existed only in our imagination have now become a reality.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Isn't that what Signora Sicilia wanted?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Well, but it's not enough; not nearly enough. We must show our presence to promote more changes.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: So I stopped trying to persuade him, but then...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You're still the same as before—no, even more naive than back then. It's kind of nice.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Texas, do you want to come with me?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: To the court?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You know I'm not interested in crowded celebrations, much less official duties involving mountains of paperwork.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'm going to stay here and ensure Leon's safety. Right now, there's no one better suited to the job, right?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Thank you, Texas.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: To be honest, if you had stayed with me in Nuova Volsinii back then—
attributes.name: Lavinia
Texas
attributes.content: I told you before, when my friends are in trouble, I'll come to help.

attributes.name: Texas
attributes.content: I'm here, aren't I?
attributes.joined: I told you before, when my friends are in trouble, I'll come to help.I'm here, aren't I?
